meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Nick Lemek Mary Twellman Julia Collins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6827.

td.p: Nick Lemek, a firefighter from Omaha, Nebraska
Mary Twellman, a retired teacher from Bowling Green, Missouri
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 6-day cash winnings total $124,810)

td.a: THE NEW YORK TIMES YOU NEVER FORGET YOUR FIRST

tr.td: (Alex: ...uh, whatever.)
ARMY BRATS
IT'S THE END "FER" YOU!
THE TV CHESSBOARD
DAM LIES
STATISTICS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(I\'m Ben Brantley.) The first show I reviewed for The New York Times was an ill-fated 1993 sequel to this beloved musical; there wasn\'t much to like--even the dog who played Sandy was rather wooden')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (I'm Ben Brantley.) The first show I reviewed for The New York Times was an ill-fated 1993 sequel to this beloved musical; there wasn't much to like--even the dog who played Sandy was rather wooden

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_2', 'clue_J_1_2_stuck', '(I\'m Mark Bittman.) Today locally grown food is the rage, but in 1991 my first Times article was about how overnight mail brings fresh food from far off, like these crustaceans sent from Maine')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Julia] What is October 8?)
(Julia: [Shrugs] I picked a date.)
(Alex: Well, you should have picked [*], and the day of the famous [*] Massacre in Chicago.)
[Mary was awarded $2,000; Nick $1,000.]
NickWhat is July 4th
$6,199
MaryWhat is Black Friday?
$9,999
JuliaWhat is October 8?
$5,000
February 14 (or Valentine\'s Day)')
